"Gunslash Boot Camp V":
"Joseph, retired ARKS training officer, at your service.
I'm glad you came by again. Are you feeling relieved
that you made it through that last boot camp?
Satisfied with yourself? Well, it's not over yet. You're
still at the doorstep, waiting to step through. You'll
have to complete this mission if you want to be
considered a true master of the gunslash.

*Defeat hostiles level 21 or higher using
only gunslashes."

"よく来たな。退役教導官のジョーゼフだ。
先の特訓を乗り越えたことで
安心していたか？　満足していたか？
甘い！　甘すぎる！
君はまだ入り口で佇んでいる程度の実力。
これから提示する課題をこなせなければ
ガンスラッシュの会得者と名乗ることは
許されないぞ！
※銃剣系限定、
Lv.21～のエネミーが対象"
